title: The photos show copper utensils being used by officials at Indore Municipal Corporation (MP), not by UP officials
subtitle: The photos officials using copper utensils for drinking water were taken at Indore Municipal Corporation in Madhya Pradesh, not in the state of Uttar Pradesh.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A couple of photos showing officials using copper utensils instead of plastic bottles for drinking water in an official meeting is being shared on social media with a claim that the photo was taken in a meeting in Uttar Pradesh. Let’s try to analyze the claim made in the post. 



Claim: Photos of UP officials using copper utensils for drinking water in an official meeting. Fact: The photos were taken during an official meeting at Indore Municipal Corporation in Madhya Pradesh, not in the state of Uttar Pradesh. Hence the claim made in the post is FALSE.

When the images in the post were run through Google Reverse Image Search, it was found that those photos were taken during an official meet at Indore Municipal Corporation. Some news websites have published the same photos explaining that the Indore Municipal Corporation has started using copper utensils, in place of plastic bottles, for drinking water.

Also, similarities in the design of the room and the conference table, and the position of the TV Screen can be seen in the photo posted on Facebook and the Indore Municipal Corporation meeting photo uploaded on the Swachh Bharat website.

To sum it up, the photos show copper utensils being used by officials at Indore Municipal Corporation (MP), not by UP officials.
